comments.content: Any ideas for as close a match as possible would be greatly appreciated, thanks

Some similarities with ITC Kabel: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/kabel/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415041949/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/kabel/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/kabel/") (most notably |G|)

Hand lettered.  
Seems to have been influenced by Dynamo, designed by K. Sommer for Ludwig & Mayer in 1930.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415041949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DynamoAsDig_6284.gif)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/dynamo-lt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415041949/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/dynamo-lt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/dynamo-lt/")  
Don

The design of Dynamo is also shown in several derived fonts, including Rotor

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415041949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RotorAsDig_5601.gif)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/rotor/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415041949/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/rotor/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/rotor/")  
Don
I knew I had already seen those ears somewhere...
